org.hps.record.composite

Class CompositeLoopAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freehep.record.loop.AbstractLoopListener
      • org.hps.record.composite.CompositeLoopAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.freehep.record.loop.LoopListener, org.freehep.record.loop.RecordListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LcioEventAdapter, LcioEventSupplier, RecordProcessorAdapter

    public class CompositeLoopAdapter
extends org.freehep.record.loop.AbstractLoopListener
implements org.freehep.record.loop.RecordListener
    Adapter for listening on the CompositeLoop for records and loop events.

    Classes that should be part of an event processing chain implemented by the CompositeLoop should extend this API in order to receive CompositeRecord objects that can be read or modified.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<CompositeRecordProcessor> processors
      The list of processors that will be activated for each record this adapter receives.
